MAN.TITLE: bouchonvm
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: mean speed computation ( circular road traffic )

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : ceil(1/v) where v is the speed
: probability for a car to have speed v

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_NAME: r vm/v where vm is the mean speed of the n cars

DESCRIPTION.P: Compute the mean speed of n cars confined to a circular road without input or output, where the cars cannot overtake each other.
The cars can take two speeds 0 and v with probabilities (1-l) and l.
In stationnary regime there are k clusters.
